ch.unige.ng.problems.santafe.context
Class Board

java.lang.Object
  ch.unige.ng.problems.santafe.context.Board
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileBoard
public abstract class Board
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines a board where containing the food, and a begin position. The basic problem has size 32x32 with 89 foods on the board. If no args are given, the problem will be like this.

There are some possible choices:

  • You can define that the board mute: the begin position changes and the position of food too.
  • You can define that the food and position is a constant

Version:
10 janv. 2005
Author:
Jacques Fontignie
